name: PVE LXC Unprivileged Rootless Docker
description: This script allows users to run rootless Docker/Podman inside unprivileged LXC containers. Allowing nesting namespaces three levels deep: Proxmox Host → Unprivileged LXC → Rootless Docker/Podman → Docker in Docker (DinD). It also facilitates GPU passthrough to these containers, enabling hardware acceleration for applications like AI and video transcoding.

notes.text: This script needs to be run after creating new LXC containers. Failure to do so will result in overlapping user namespaces, which could pose a security risk.
Running containers will be stopped temporarily while applying namespace changes.
